quotes.quote: Protecting yourself is self defense. Protecting others is warriorship.
Sometimes, staying away from people is the only protection that you have for your heart.
Safety is an illusion and perhaps it's better to challenge it sometimes, to see how far we can go, to learn about the stuff we are made of.
Protection is not a principle, but an expedient.
Protection of private property is a fundamental right protected in a strong democracy.
You have to get beyond the barrier of self-protection before you can really fly.
A protector can't protect someone who does not wish to be protected.
They who can give up essential liberty to obtain a little temporary safety deserve neither liberty nor safety.
To enable men to exercise that power is the object of protection.
The best protection for the people is not necessarily to believe everything people tell them.
Be good to others, that will protect you against evil.
Protection is the first necessity of opulence and luxury.
You're safe not because of the absence of danger, but because of the presence of God.
One of the best protections against disappointment is to have a lot going on.
It was easier to be brave when someone needed your protection.
Protection of religious freedom means considering the faiths and beliefs of everyone involved.
Even the powerful needed protection sometimes.
Protectionism is the institutionalization of economic failure.
A man without a vote is man without protection.
Protection of human life can be costly; but so is the neglect of that protection.
It doesn't matter what's in front of her, because she knows who's behind her.
The real protection of life and property, always and everywhere.
Protection and security are only valuable if they do not cramp life excessively.
The protection of a man's person is more sacred than the protection of his property.
The best lightning rod for your protection is your own spine.
When you're safe at home, you wish you were having an adventure; when you're having an adventure, you wish you were safe at home.
Where the press is free and every man able to read, all is safe
If we cannot end now our differences, at least we can help make the world safe for diversity.

Where justice is denied, where poverty is enforced, where ignorance prevails. amd where any one class ios made to feel that society is an organized conspiracy to oppress, rob and degrade them, neither persons nor property will be safe.
